answerText: Flagstaff [10] Flagstaff is in the northern part of this state, which contains Sedona, Lake Havasu City, and Phoenix.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Maryland B + Loyola  | 1 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Meteor Crater lies about 40 miles east of this city. For 10 points each: [10] Name this home of the Lowell Observatory, where Pluto was discovered in 1930. Route 66 lies through it, and going east from this town on I-40, one hits the town of Winslow and the Painted Desert.
